website_summaries.verdict: A 4-pack of occlusion training bands that are appropriately sized for arms and legs.
pros: There are two different size bands, two 1.25-inch wide 23.5-inch long bands for your arms and two 2-inch wide 39.5-inch long bands for your legs
A free instruction manual and user's guide is included with each set of bands
cons: Occasionally, the bands may loosen slightly during your workout and require a quick re-tightening

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy these bands are to put on and remove. That's the best feature... especially since I was using rubber therapy bands before. I do have to say that they're almost too big for me. I'm 5'2" and 118#. Had a hard time feeling like I was getting them tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Backman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to anyone wanting to take their training to the next level
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that I've been using for 2 months, very easy to use, extremely durable, I love that it comes with a little pouch for the bands and can easily fit in a bag, love that the bands come for both arms and for legs for training. Highly recommend this product and a firm believer in it! Check out the video to see how it works and what to prepare for. Thanks Ronin for making a great product 🙌🏼💯
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t tighten enough
customer_reviews.text: These stay on very well and come off easily. The only problems with them are that they don’t tighten nearly enough and the extra part of the band doesn’t stay tucked in so you have a giant string hanging on each arm while you’re trying to workout.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly and stay tight
customer_reviews.text: They stay strapped unlike some other products like this that come loose. Pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ksigg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quite comfortable but I do wish the legs weren't so long. I also wish I could tighten a little more but they work well for cardio so will use my other wrap from another company for lower body lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Hessler

customer_reviews.title: Newbie to BFR
customer_reviews.text: These bands are perfect. I had never used BfR bands before so I wanted something easy and user-friendly. These bands wrap nicely and stay in place. The only thing is the straps are very, very long. I just adjusted to my size and trimmed the length. Be careful not to leave some length as u may need them longer as ur muscles grow. Thanks ronin I’m a satisfied customer😁
customer_reviews.author: Chingchowla

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied after first workout
customer_reviews.text: I used the wraps today for the first time. Like others have said, the pump was great. At 55, I need to pay attention to my joints and using lighter weights is a big plus. Using 40% of max with 30-15-15-15 reps was a real challenge, and well worth it. And the wraps were easy on & off. Looking forward to seeing the results after some more time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New to BFR Exercising? Me too.
customer_reviews.text: Robin Wraps work as described. Definitely builds a pump during exercise. The wraps do loosen as you workout, assuming that’s part of design. Not an everyday tool for me but it depends on your goal.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bober

customer_reviews.title: Best bfr bands
customer_reviews.text: Tried a lot of bfr bands these are by far the best around. Easy to tighten myself and release compared to others
customer_reviews.author: John Barnstable

customer_reviews.title: Ronan Wraps, A new way to train muscles
customer_reviews.text: The Ronan Wrap is very useful for my continued recovery from double knee replacement 16 months ago. It's improving my work-outs and helping to allow me to play tennis again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Hudson-Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Egh
customer_reviews.text: Probably better ones on the market. Hard to get tight.
customer_reviews.author: cari

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It as as described and functions the way it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bands
customer_reviews.text: I like the bands. I can feel the difference in my muscles while working out. Especially in my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good price, fast shipping. Not sure how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Booner

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Blood flow restriction training (occlusion training) is a great addition to any workout program and the Ronin wraps are (in my opinion) the best wraps you can get for the price. The Ronin wraps include a set for your arms AND a set for your legs whereas most sets only come with one or the other but cost the same.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I do love how they make me feel the pumps and the burn. I do wish they had a more easier adjustment and after awhile they do start to bother the skin, but all in all great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Need to have huge legs and arms to work...
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are huge already. I found the straps way too big for my medium arms and legs. Too bad. I wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Ronin Wraps. I heard about occlusion training from a friend and I wanted to try it. It took me a few tries to get good at adjusting them. But after that, it's been easy. They're comfortable and it definitely makes my lifting routine a lot harder. I feel stronger and more tone already. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Understand the science behind it..but more of a distraction
customer_reviews.text: I didnt think it was all that great...I got the purpose..but was uncomfortable and didnt stay on right...had to fix on every set
customer_reviews.author: John Delledera

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These bands work great. Just wish the arm bands were about 1/4inch wider.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay tight. The point is for them to stay tight during a workout
customer_reviews.author: Twizzle

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The Ronin Wraps work really well. They are comfortable and easy to adjust. I really like the Ebook with workout. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Fujioka

customer_reviews.title: Win win...
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome product!! I start using this and it’s felt good and the ebook is a bonus deal
customer_reviews.author: Nilda L. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Ronin Wraps
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with my Ronin Wraps and been working out with them consistently and I can tell I am getting muscles in my arms which I never had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To use is easy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it is excellent but they could've used heavier elastic but it is great!!
customer_reviews.author: william davis

customer_reviews.title: I will buy another set or two!!
customer_reviews.text: Not do they , I will add several more sets to trauma kits as Tourniquets.
customer_reviews.author: Vonn

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but not great!
customer_reviews.text: Work as intended. They do loosen as you workout. Also no markings to adjust to the same restriction.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Effective for muscle building and good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to get back into weightlifting after a break for a few years. A personal trainer friend suggested occlusion bands, and I decided these were good value. They are high quality and have a sturdy buckle. The basic idea is to limit the blood and oxygen flow to really engage the limbs and build muscle. The bands fit snugly, and do not move around. I’m also able to use lower weights with higher repetitions. So far, I’m quite pleased with the results and it’s helping me rebuild my muscle mass. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: The product delivers as stated. The pump you feel after using this product with light weights and high reps is easily equivalent to a hardcore heavy lift day with all out exertion.
customer_reviews.author: O3G

customer_reviews.title: Great bands - even for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I've just started with occlusion training and I must say, I really like these bands. My friend introduced me to occlusion training and these bands - he's been using them for a while. They work well, but are still comfortable, even when drawn tight. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: cutter

customer_reviews.title: Are they working
customer_reviews.text: Liked getting different sizes for the arms and legs but having trouble getting them tight enough and keeping them tight.
customer_reviews.author: A. RICHARD MONTEVILLE

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: These work! I used these wraps to help rehabilitate my injured knee. They’ve helped me rebuild my strength, both in my lower body and upper body.
customer_reviews.author: Demsas

customer_reviews.title: Super effective and comfortable at a great price point!
customer_reviews.text: Package is neat and compact carrying case is nice. I tried the arm band out and stretch is great as well as comfort. No pinching when adjusting or wearing. Definitely worth it especially at price point for what I opine is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to use. Worth the price compared to other occlusion bands. The ebook is quite thorough.
customer_reviews.author: muhammad hafiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Wraps
customer_reviews.text: They work like a charm. My friend happened to have a pair at the gym and the pump feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: setuchainz

customer_reviews.title: No graduation marks
customer_reviews.text: Only problem with these is that there are no graduation marks allowing you to set the same tightness every time.
customer_reviews.author: Miko

product_meta.title: Ronin Wraps | Elastic BFR Occlusion Bands | Blood Flow Restriction Training | 4 Pack (2 for arms - 2 for Legs) | Free 21 Page Ebook | Sleek NO Pinch Buckle Design | Comfortable Elastic Material
product_meta.description: Start your occlusion training experience off right with the best wraps on the market! Ronin Wraps are easy to use and work well from the very first workout. They’re sleek and durable and they look great in the gym. Put them on, pull them tight, and get ready for the burn! Occlusion training has been tested and proven to safely and effectively build strength and help you gain muscle mass, all while lifting lighter weights. It’s a great option if you need a new way to challenge your body and breakthrough plateaus, need a break from any heavy lifting that might be breaking down your body, or if you need help gaining or keeping strength after an injury or surgery. “From bodybuilding to rehabilitation, BFR is the future of intelligently designed muscular strength and hypertrophy programming, and for good reason, it produces results.” – ESPN
feature_bullets: ✔️ DESIGN - "The difference is in our design, our focus in design is functionality." Ronin Wraps are made with the highest quality elastic material, perfect for pulling tight for the proper occlusion while still having the flexibility for full flexion and extension during your exercises.
✔️ COMFORT - Our buckle is sleek and designed for complete comfort – no pinching at all. It’s super easy to pull tight and even easier to release the pressure once you’re finished training.

✔️ FUNCTIONALITY - We know that proper occlusion happens with the proper width within the band, and the ideal width for the arms is different than the legs. The widths we use for the arms is 1.25 inches, for the legs it’s 2 inches – both are ideal widths for proper occlusion.

✔️ VALUE - We offer the best value for your purchase. Our package is complete and includes occlusion training wraps for both upper and lower body training, a convenient carry bag, and a 21 page comprehensive eBook that includes an upper and lower body workout.
✔️ GUARANTEE - Satisfaction and results are guaranteed! If you don’t like your new Ronin Wraps and you don’t get the results we promise, we’ll buy them back from you – no questions asked!
